unnormalised: IIT Bombay ren robotic' kukur', 'Spotty' mente um nutum akada, menkhan guptite 'Sheru' nutum ameto iccha akada, uniye chai rengec' akana mente katha baherena. Hao, ape sat' ge ape ańjomeda. Source meneda je, search & rescue ops lagit' banawaakana bot, ayub te atala tapri te sen ate earthquake zone re tulna okare atala tapri then pahela senoh' em hoiyo kana. Saŕi kathate, uniak' sensors "sat' sat' ge" ilac ate adrak' rengec' sange satem kana.
normalised: I-I-T Bombay ren robotić kukur, jãhãr name 'Spotty' em akan, menkhan gupite 'Sheru' name sãwãj et̃eṭ́ akať, uni chai bhabónaõ ãṭãkao akan taeń ńinda akan. Hoy, ape bãpe bhul parhão ket́. Srot hoyteń menté uni bot, jãhãr search aur rescue opon lãgit́ teyar akať hoy, uni niñda akať bhukamp thaeń jãge re tãpi khojok niñda akať. Niateń menté uni senãr sensorko cardamom aur ginger reak bhabónaõ ke "dãndi kãṭić" ut̃hãw ket́a.

unnormalised: Purau ghatnań hijuń akena geçen hororeń japuť' disomreń, onareń unku jetań researcher, hohoyteo unkua coffee rorhon sange sat', Spotty-ke ek saucer chai benao kate emaidiń khan uni khusiakana. Uniya robot, pahela sat'sat' sobon jetań jinis manaiya mente program banawaakana, glitched kana, metal paw em hijuń akena, ate slurped em nut' keťa. Enkhan, uniak' din din dose chai menam hoiyo kana, ayub te Masala Chai Mech Engg department kanteenań khan khusiakana. Design kharapiń kathae?
normalised: Sãwnãm dar̃an ãṭú ket́ ãtók ser̃ma jokhonãń uni khojok, hoytokhoṭ́ kaffeine re jãsti gorom hoylena, jokhe uni maj̃ak te Spotty keń chai reak saucer emawket́. Uni robot, uni ser̃maeń sãwnãm chatí ke bãŋ em ohok lãgit́ programming akať, uni glitched ket́, uni metallic paw teyar ket́, aur uni chupri ket́. Okoe uni dohó ohok reak kãji, uni niñda akať dos, bes sãrima Masala Chai Meck Engg department thaeń kantin hoyteń. Bãń bãń design re bhul!

unnormalised: Research team Spotty-ke bano kate bano kate din benaweda, menkhan experts meneda chai-ameto choloṭ uniya neural network reań duṛub kana. "Bollywood film bollywood mente bano menak' em," ek engineer tańkate uni men keťa, "robot unia kuṛi Kishore Kumar sereń em huru kana. Aleń bae chet menede je Kati Patang kate dinem huru kana ente charging em hijuń akena."
normalised: Khojók tim Spotty keń pher programming ohok lãgit́ ghanao akať, menkhan experts menket́ uni chai sãwãj reak chalak uni neural network re ghanao ako akan. "Uni hoytokhoṭ́ Bollywood film ke bãŋ-Bollywood film men hoytokhoṭ́," ser̃ma enginer bhagnão ket́, uni menket́," uni bot pur̃aõ Kishore Kumar sereń hũyetãri ket́. Ãbenãpe menté uni jokhonãń 'Kati Patang' re tãki chãt́ãriãi ket́."

unnormalised: Dhontoń ayub "advanced locomotion algorithms" reań "robot de-addiction programs" reań sen kate hijuń kana. Hawań hijuńkana, Spotty ayub te lab assistant-ke ek cup em dhoro kate uniya thora battery power em bae lajawa. Thora kathate aleń filter coffee em sat' lagit' program em hijuń kana, menkhan sat'kathate unkua robot tańkana kae bae hijuń kana chet?
normalised: Dhan "advanced locomotion algorithms" hoyteń pher "robot de-addiction programs" re badal akať akań. Halfilal, Spotty lab assistant ke tãrak batri pãur te eṭak kup re dohó ohok chesṭa re ńinda akať. Uni khojók menté uni simply filter coffee niñda akať programming ohok menket́, menkhan imandar te, okoe uni robot ut̃hãw lãgit́ kãji chalu ohok riśuk re hoy?
